name: Elixir
description:
Step into the worn shoes of an ancient alchemist, awakened within a mysterious house shrouded with secrets. Explore your surroundings to uncover forgotten alchemy techniques and recipes, while damned souls beg for your assistance with their ailments and boons.

Each lost soul has unique conditions that you’ll need to identify to create the right Elixir to help them on their journey. Every action you take, every Elixir you create is a piece to unlocking the mysterious storyline.



As an alchemist, your craft is a double-edged sword, where the line between salvation and damnation blurs. Every Elixir created can cure an ailment, but tread cautiously, for they may also bring unforeseen consequences. Can you decipher properly and find your salvation?

With an array of materials waiting for you to discover and unlock, you’ll learn to craft over 700 Elixirs to help solve over 10 million situations – each soul encounter is randomized with its own unique attributes. And each journey through the game is a new and unique experience.



Embark on a dark journey, where strategic thinking and experimentation are your greatest allies. Solve puzzles, unlock the story, and unearth the secrets hidden in this world. Welcome to Elixir!
